An innovative fintech platform that offers it's clients easy to integrate API's to enable instant payments and financial data into any app.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"textStyle","attrs":{"color":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"textStyle","attrs":{"color":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"textStyle","attrs":{"color":""}}]},{"text":"Currently I'm UX/UI design manager, with my role split between leading both the web team, and design system team. This includes priority planning, project and stakeholder management, full e2e design process and some front end development work when needed and much more.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"textStyle","attrs":{"color":""}}]}]}]},"title":"Time is an app aimed at Healthcare Professionals; offering them Shift Booking functionality as well as a newsfeed to keep them up to date and a chat and discover system to connect colleagues across healthcare.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"I joined Ryalto in September 2018 as UX/UI Designer, before long the took on a more varied \"Head of Design\" role when I became sole Designer, handling all UX and UI designs for the iOS and Android version of the app, as well as revitalising the brand, creating brand guidelines, designing and developing the website and supporting all marketing materials etc","type":"text"}]}]},"title":"Time to","alignment":"left","component":"header","isScrolling":false,"header_items":[],"animatedTitle":"Ryalto"},{"_uid":"6b585f30-f532-4e53-a0d4-dde799a7b31b","columns":[{"_uid":"cfcfda06-8fcf-44d0-bb4a-2868019a9738","body":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Design I started in May 16 working under my design manager then took over as sole designer in Oct 17 for almost year before leaving in Sep 18.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"My role was varied as BRS created apps, websites and CMS systems for clients as well as marketing and promotional support.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"While at BRS I designed a wide variety of apps including food ordering, loyalty and more. Designing CMS systems and food ordering sites ans systems.
